channel.title: ClassicPK - Join us today!
channel.description:
[center][b]Welcome To Classic PK[/b]
[url=http://www.classicpk.com]ClassicPK[/url]
[b]Quick links.[/b]
[url=http://www.classicpk.com/controlPanel.php]Control panel[/url] [url=http://www.classicpk.com/login.php]Login[/url] [url=http://www.classicpk.com/register.php]Register[/url]
[b]Info:[/b]
I have too much free time, so I thought opening a PK server which everyone can enjoy. We welcome suggestions on improving my server. We will take very seriously on all the suggestions given so do not be shy:) We will focus very hard on finding the proper moderators. Autoing is prohibited and will end with ban directly
[b]Ingame[/b]
Clan System. Point System. Fast XP.
Check it out for more info.
[b]Basics[/b]
Stable Economy. Stable drops. Plenty NPCs around.
[b]Website.[/b]
Basic Forum. Control Panel.
[b]Pictures.[/b]
[img]http://www.classicpk.com/uploads/1.png[/img] [img]http://www.classicpk.com/uploads/2.png[/img] [img]http://www.classicpk.com/uploads/3.png[/img] [img]http://www.classicpk.com/uploads/4.png[/img] [img]http://www.classicpk.com/uploads/5.png[/img][/center]

item.dc:creator: @Miles1 Miles`
item.description:
@Miles1 wrote:

[quote=“Anc13ntsIsBack, post:61, topic:399132”][quote author=CodeForFame link=topic=496266.msg3643011#msg3643011 date=1309157147]

I’m still waiting for this ‘proof’ that I’m someone else…

In time, it’s on my windows 2000 PC which I use to have & still do have, I just need to plug in the monitor and boot it up. I’ll do it soon.

I believe that’s the first time I said it actually…?

You’ve been saying that for more than a year…
[/quote][/quote]
Fail Quote.

Read full topic

item.title: ClassicPK - Join us today!
item.dc:creator: @Nothing1 -Nothing
item.description:
@Nothing1 wrote:

[quote=“Anc13ntsIsBack, post:51, topic:399132”][quote author=-Nothing link=topic=496266.msg3642291#msg3642291 date=1309104607]

The only person who’s gotten away with a fake alias so far is CodeForFame, as Edward. hahah. Yet he still uses it. Since I know he’s going to reply to my post,

Is this you? I remember when you were talking to TX on vent and you said you had this. Probably is.

Who cares even if that’s him? If moparscape members would see your picture they would rofl like hell. You are typical 14-15 year old kid trying to flame somebody of his looks, just so lame, I personally dont care about peoples looks, and I bet most people don’t care either.
[/quote]
14-15 Typical Kid? Alright, you can say that even though I’m not even close to that age. & I wasn’t flaming him of his looks, I was asking if it was him. Now you’re the typical 14-15 year old kid who flames people for no reason.[/quote]
You’re younger? Ah that makes sense. You were attempting to flame about his looks, but since you failed you deny it. And I aren’t flaming for no reason.

Read full topic
